content: half_double_crochet skip st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off serpent star copyright lettice rose 2024 16 double_crochet 56 half_double_crochet 24 decrease 28 single_crochet 4 chain-2 round 18 starting with yarn b in any corner chain-2 and using a standing stitch 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet skip 2 st 3 double_crochet in next st x 10 skip 1 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 36 double_crochet/side 4 chain-2 corners round 19 you will need to push stitches aside to find the correct places to stitch particularly in the corners starting with yarn e in the 1st double_crochet after a corner using a standing st sc3tog spsc in each of next 2 skipped double_crochet of round 17 sc3tog spsc in each of next 2 skipped double_crochet of round 17 x 9 sc3tog 2 spsc in next skipped double_crochet of round 17 sc3tog 2 spsc chain 2 2 spsc in round 17 chain-2 between round 18 double_crochet groups x 4 slip_stitch to 1st sc3tog to join finish off 26 spsc 12 sc3tog / side 4 chain-2 corners this round might look a bit full as if there are too many stitches this is because the sc3tog is a wide stitch the final round will bring it in nice and square round 20 starting in any corner with yarn b and a standing single_crochet single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in corner chain skip st hidden single_crochet in each of next 38 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 39 single_crochet/side 4 chain-2 corners replace this round with taller stitches or leave off altogether to get your perfect size finish those last ends and block if you wish serpent star copyright lettice rose 2024
